name: Qvabllock
description: «Qvabllock» — pixemalism game with elements of puzzle, with minimalistic gameplay. Collect all the colored squares to take the main green and go through all 30 levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Storage: 128 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 mb Storage: 130 MB available space
